abstract.p: Photos of well-designed accessories (special section, Men's Fashions of The Times) (part 2 of 2-part section)

block.p: The difference between a man who's just dressed and a well-dressed man is in his choice of accessories. Here is where he defines his individual style elegant businessman, modern minimalist, sporty activist or a combination of all three. The signature looks of this season include English-style shoes for business, sandals for play, iridescent ties, modernist-style watches, suede belts with brushed metal buckles, streamlined sneakers and messenger-style bags. Put them all together, they spell: Spring '98.
